                                   boolean sync,
                                   boolean ignoreExpired,
                                   boolean ignoreClsNotFound)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        cacheName - Cache name.
        topic - Topic for ordered messages.
        locLsnr - Local listener.
        rmtFilter - Remote filter.
        oldValRequired - Old value required flag.
        sync - Synchronous flag.
        ignoreExpired - Ignore expired events flag.
